stylists.name: Wendy
stylists.quote: I was inspired by my father, an experienced sheep shearer. Watching him work, I noticed how content and happy the sheep were afterward. It sparked my desire to bring that same sense of care and satisfaction to others.

stylists.name: Bluey
stylists.quote: From as far back as I can remember, I've always loved to express my creativity and artistry. To be able to share this experience with each person in my chair is a truly wonderful feeling.

stylists.name: Cookie
stylists.quote: Having the opportunity to meet new people while making them beautiful has been amazing! I can't wait to see you so we can share stories and have a great time at the salon.

stylists.name: Doreen
stylists.quote: It is seeing the smiles of my guests faces that keep me going. I have many years of experience, but what I enjoy most is seeing the joy on someones face after a beautiful transformation.

stylists.name: Bingo
stylists.quote: My childhood has lead me on this adventure where I have the freedom to help express the beauty inside onto the outside. There is more imagination to be explored so come on by and let's explore together!
